title: Free digital account
text: You pay nothing to have a FastBank account, solve everything in a single app and even choose how you want to pay your bills.

title: CDI Yield
text: CDI Yield With no limit on your earnings, FastBank has the account with the best automatic income after 30 days, with no maximum investment limit and with FGC guarantee.

title: Installment payment slips
text: With no limit on your earnings, FastBank has the account with the best automatic income after 30 days, with no maximum investment limit and with FGC guarantee.

title: Hassle-free salary portability
text: Bring your salary to FastBank and control your financial life in the best possible way. Invest, pay and receive on FastBank.
